title: Is Her Boyfriend Too Sensitive Or Is She Overreacting?
description:
Her boyfriend is very in tune with his emotions, and it's a huge turn-off for her. He cries during movies, music, and anytime she mentions him hurting her feelings. It's too much for her. And she wants to know, is it normal for her to be turned off by this?
